actions.text: Proposed amendment SA 2888 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 2888 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Hutchison to Amendment SA 2898. (consideration: CR S3060-3061; text: CR S3060-3061) To allow a deduction for State and local sales taxes in lieu of State and local income taxes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2888 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Hutchison to Amendment SA 2898.

amends_amendment.purpose: Grassley Amendment No. 2898 (to the instructions (to Amendment No. 2886) of the motion to recommit (listed above)), relative to the effective date following enactment of the Act.

purpose: To allow a deduction for State and local sales taxes in lieu of State and local income taxes.
